comment.brief: The size of the image of the image will be reported as 0 for unknown dimensions during initial calculations.
comment.full: The size of the image of the image will be reported as 0 for unknown dimensions during initial calculations.

comment.brief: The natural size of the image, based on Source/Density will be used
comment.full: The natural size of the image, based on Source/Density will be used

comment.brief: During layout this indicates how the size of the image should be reported.
comment.full:
During layout this indicates how the size of the image should be reported.

This is typically modified when using larger images in a layout where you don't want the image to influence the size of the panel but to just stretch to fill it.
